reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The project supports a research initiative related to youth employment, reasons for youth un- and underemployment and the position of young workers in the labour market, taking as examples so called megaprojects in five places around the country. After com pletion of the research report there will be a launching / publishing event, distribution and use in the relevant affiliate unions of OTM-CS. OTM-CS has recently started research activities by elaborating a high quality general overview of the current labo ur market situation, but has since not had sufficient resources to carry out other research projects with more limited thematic focus, however, this kind of research reports are important tools for the unions to defend the interests of members and engage i n policy ? advocacy work. As results it is expected that the visibility and more active intervention capacity of the trade union movement improves, the negotiation and advocacy work becomes more effective and these indirectly boost membership growth and ac tive participation. Beneficiaries are members of the 16 OTM-CS affiliates. The project is carried out by the older and bigger of the two Mozambican national centres Organizacao dos Trabalhadores de Mocambique ? Central Sindical OTM-CS.
